p: Finally, this work suggests ways to prohibit the gaining of DENV which is to avoid being bitten by mosquitoes that carries the disease. Although this can be done by avoiding areas where dengue is endemic, but may be that is not the ideal strategy because it would require a person to avoid almost of the tropical and subtropical areas of the world, many of which are popular purpose to travel, work or at least using natural repellent for mosquitoes.
